title: Casino Slots 1.7.3 -3D Game
description:
Try your luck at slot machines in this dynamic 3D environment. LastEnd Casino Slots Random Number Generators is continually generating so the game play is always changing. This is a nice way to try out your luck on slot machines without using real money. 

Contains 3 Slot Designs
 Hot 7 slot is a 3 reel set at multiple values, VRS Slot is a 3 reel set a $1 value, and Lucky Farm Slot is a 6 reel set at multiple values. Each shot can be play by using the slot lever or by hitting the spin button. The bet can be changed by using multiplier buttons, this allow you to multiply the bet from 1-10. 

 Casino Slots features an online high scoreboard that allow you to compare your luck and skill against other players from around the world. The Casino also contains an high rollers area that contains $10 slots machines, and a video Blackjack machine. 

 To uses the scoreboard look for the cash out A.T.M. located in the main game room. You can also reset the money using the A.T.M. if you need more. The A.T.M. does not take real money.
